solution_line_template: He has to cook {total_hamburgers_needed} hamburgers and has already cooked {hamburgers_already_cooked} so he needs to cook {total_hamburgers_needed}-{hamburgers_already_cooked} = <<{total_hamburgers_needed}-{hamburgers_already_cooked}={hamburgers_remaining_to_cook}>>{hamburgers_remaining_to_cook} more hamburgers

He can only cook {hamburgers_per_session} hamburgers at a time so that means he has to cook {hamburgers_remaining_to_cook}/{hamburgers_per_session} = <<{hamburgers_remaining_to_cook}/{hamburgers_per_session}={sessions_needed}>>{sessions_needed} more cooking sessions
